sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Box, Button, Card, Grid, Input, Paper, Typography, styled } from '@mui/material' import { addTodo } from '../../../redux/actions' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' const MainComponent = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [task, setTask] = useState("") const todos = useSelector(state => state.todos) const handleAddTask = () => { dispatch(addTodo(task)) } const Item = styled(Paper)(({ theme }) => ({ backgroundColor: '#1A2027', ...theme.typography.body2, padding: theme.spacing(4), textAlign: 'center', color: 'white', })); return ( <>
HEADING LEADS { setTask(event.target.value) }} />
{ todos.length ? todos.map((item, ind) => ( <> Item Item Item {item} )) : null } ) } export default MainComponent
